values.description: A versions changelog is now available on OculusDB
A versions changelog has been updated
Dlc details updated (e. g. price, name)
Dlc pack details updated (e. g. price, name, included dlcs)
Webhook only: Version is now downloadable

endpoints.description: Gets the 200 most recent updates to OculusDB

endpoints.description: Retrieves an object by its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the document to retrieve (application, dlc, dlc pack, version)

exampleResponse.display_long_description:
Rec Room is the best place to build and play games together. Party up with friends from all around the world to chat, hang out, explore MILLIONS of player-created rooms, or build something new and amazing to share with us all.
Rec Room is free, and cross plays on everything from phones to VR headsets. It’s the social app you play like a video game!
- Customize and dress up your cute Rec Room avatar to express your style
- Discover challenging, fun or straight up weird games made by creators just like you
- Try your skill with the Maker Pen, the tool used by Rec Room creators to build everything from puppies to helicopters to entire worlds!
- Join the best community - Rec Room is a fun and welcoming place for people from all walks of life! Let us help you find people you’ll LOVE to hang out with.

endpoints.description: Gets all applications, versions, dlcs and dlc packs associated with an element of the specified id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the document to retrieve (application, dlc, dlc pack, version)

applications.display_long_description:
What is Battle Talent?
Battle Talent is a physics-based roguelite action game that satisfies your Combat Fantasy. 

Features:
* Fight your way: you have infinite possibilities with our advanced physics simulation.
* Build your way: archmage? swordmaster? marksman? the choice is yours!
* Run your way: climbing, running and sliding.
* And More: mod support, sandbox, war mode, multi-languages support...

PS:
* We host the mods on mod.io
* We will checkout reviews and discord everyday, feel free to tell us about your experience
* The demo version only contains 90% of Trailer content

versions.changeLog:
Change Log For V10P3

[fixed] mod loading bug
[fixed] 'swing arm' could be moving too fast
[fixed] fighting room may be stuck, no enemy is being spawned.
[fixed] laser sight was not working.

### ChangeLog for V10P2

Hi everyone, now we have a better UI and loading mods on demand should help with the crash problem.
Btw, the modding toolkit and document will be updated soon.

>> UI
- [changed] UI Improvement

>> Mod
- [added] Loading on demand

>> Other
- [changed] Bullet deals more damage but is less likely to knock down an enemy
- [changed] Tutorial Update
- [fixed] Ice Wand Enhance Bug
- [added] Ear simulation for Goblins on Quest
- [changed] Throwing is easier
- [fixed] Spin weapon around your hand

V10P1 Change Log
- Optimize the loading speed
- Slow Motion is back

>> Level
- [changed] Hall Remade 
- [changed] Tutorials Update, better voice over
- [changed] Sandbox Update 
- [added] New Sandbox Scene

>> Npc
- [changed] Goblin Model Redesigned
- [changed] Small Goblin Model Redesigned 
- [changed] New Basic Weapons 
- [changed] New Armors for All Npcs
- [added] Dynamic Tattoo 
- [added] Dynamic Face
- [added] Cloth Waving
- [added] New Boss in Dungeon02
- [added] New Goblin Lv2 x2

>> Other
- [added] Cut Npc in half alone the waist
- [changed] UI Update (25%), will be 100% in the next patch.
- [removed] AI Command is removed (will be back once it's polished)
- [added] Mod Menu Keyboard
- [changed] Basic Interaction Improvement 
- [added] Weapon Enhance System, most weapons will be more powerful after several upgrades in dungeon. Such as the fireball spell will leave a burning fire on the ground.
- [changed] No coding needed for modding basic weapon
- [changed] Textures Improvement

just a small bug fix, you can choose not to update if you don't use it.
* fixed swing arm movement

1. fixed mod compatiable issue
2. fixed conflict issue between mods caused by builtinshader. (PS: modder please update your ModProj)

The main part of this update is the physics improvement, it brings us fast and accurate hit detection. In fact, there're many more changes in this update, but many of them are very subtle, so they're not written in the changelog.
Btw, our daily players have doubled since the last update, thanks for playing Battle Talent !
#Changelog for V9P5
  - AI voice over in tutorial [new]
  - AI command system [new] [experimental]
  - Optimize overall physics detection [changed]
  - Spell can only be cast after putting it in your glove [changed]

Our daily active players and playtime are creating new records. Thanks for waiting and supporting us for such a long time! And hopefully, we can launch the full version in 2022.

Wish you a happy and wonderful new year!

-- by dev and moderator team



ChangeLog for V9P4 

#Level

height calibrate in home scene [added]
new tomb01 scene [changed]
new elf archer in sandbox [added]

#Combat

equipable magic stone [added]
stab can slice after side stabbed[added]
opmitize call back feature, and it's unlocked by default [changed]
you may hit enemy fly away with blunt weapon [added]
spin spear around your hand is back [changed]

#Mod

added predefined swing effect button in ModTK [added]
open sourced some in-game weapons in ModTK [added]
added bgm api for modding [added]

#Other

hand climb support(with wood) [added]
parkour tutorial updated [changed]
slow-mo can be stopped [changed]
sound effect updated [changed]
footstep sound for wooden material [added]

Hello, the new patch has been released. After I finished refractoring the combat code, I realized there're many old machimics broken. This patch is primarily about fixing those issues under the new code architecture. 

ChangeLog for V9P3
- Elf is back
- Added two levels
- Combat code improvement
  - Callback system fixed
  - Dismember is easier 
  - Throat slicing is easier
  - Harder to knock down enemies
  - Fixed shooting weapon with bow
- New Interrupt system
  - Interruption is determined by state, body part be hitted, weapon you used and how you used your weapon all together 
- Performance optimized
- ModToolkit update
  - It contains new examples with source code: https://github.com/fonzieyang/BTModToolkit
  - There are more examples coming soon

Change Log for V0.0.9P2

* modding in pc is fixed
* easier to punch
* easier to callback weapons
* slow-mo stabbing bug is fixed
* strongmace(hammer) is fixed
* hp mlp in the sandbox is fixed
* and ... to make up for the loss of elf, we have goblin Lv3 in the sandbox

ChangeLog to V0.0.9P1

* small goblins and small skulls become bigger
* slow-mo gliding is fixed
* disarmed by enemy is removed
* the weapon swing speed is revert back
* telekinesis throwing glitch is fixed 
* fireball is easier to throw

endpoints.description: Gets an android application by package name. Only android applications as only those have an package name

parameters.name: packagename
parameters.description: The package name of the application

applications.display_long_description:
Beat Saber is a unique VR rhythm game where your goal is to slash the beats (represented by small cubes) as they are coming at you. 

Every beat indicates which saber you need to use and also the direction you need to match. All the music is composed to perfectly fit the handmade levels. 

Our goal is to make players almost dance while cutting the cubes and avoiding obstacles.

Each cut is strongly supported by great sound and visual effects to emphasize the rhythm.

BTS Music Pack is brought to you by Big Hit Entertainment.

- First of the Year (Equinox) 
- Ragga Bomb (feat. Ragga Twins)

- Scary Monsters and Nice Sprites
- The Devil’s Den 

Skrillex Music Pack is brought to you by OWSLA/Atlantic Records.

Beat Games studio brings fresh beats from Lady Gaga to Beat Saber! Dive into the pulsing music of Lady Gaga and slash the beats in our brand new Lady Gaga Music Pack. See you on the leaderboards!  

Lady Gaga Music Pack includes the tracks: 
- Alejandro
- Bad Romance 
- Born This Way
- Just Dance (feat. Colby O’Donis)
- Paparazzi
- Poker Face
- Rain On Me (with Ariana Grande)
- Stupid Love

Lady Gaga Music Pack is brought to you by Interscope Records.

exampleResponse.displayLongDescription:
Beat Saber is a unique VR rhythm game where your goal is to slash the beats (represented by small cubes) as they are coming at you. 

Every beat indicates which saber you need to use and also the direction you need to match. All the music is composed to perfectly fit the handmade levels. 

Our goal is to make players almost dance while cutting the cubes and avoiding obstacles.

Each cut is strongly supported by great sound and visual effects to emphasize the rhythm.

exampleResponse.displayShortDescription: Upgrade your experience with the first Official Brand Pack from Adidas. Pick from a selection of soccer balls from playground bangers to world cup classics. Equip from your locker and use in any Rezzil Heading drill.

Upgrade your experience with the Official Manchester City FC Pack. Pick from a selection of kit from branded gloves to exclusive soccer balls. To top it off, experience heading drills in the mighty Etihad Stadium!

Upgrade your experience with the first Official Brand Pack from Adidas. Pick from a selection of footballs from playground bangers to world cup classics. Equip from your locker and use in any Rezzil Heading drill.

Upgrade your experience with the Official Manchester City FC Pack. Pick from a selection of kit from branded gloves to exclusive footballs. To top it off, experience heading drills in the mighty Etihad Stadium!

parameters.name: activityid
parameters.description: The id of the activity to retrieve

endpoints.description: Gets a list of all apps in the database. May be slow due to the large number of apps.

exampleResponse.display_long_description:
Become a powerful wizard and test your mettle as a defender of the Realm of Meliora! Based on the award-winning spellcaster The Wizards, this game is a completely new magical adventure set in the same fantasy world, developed from the ground for Oculus Go and Gear VR. 

Now with two more levels, new enemies and game mechanics!

Features:
• Detailed graphics powered by Unreal Engine 4
• Intuitive gesture-based system of spellcasting
• Four elemental spells with unique conjuring gestures
• Five original fantasy levels
• Leveling and spell upgrading system for the ultimate wizardry 
• Online leaderboard to challenge fellow wizards

IMPORTANT: The game does not support some phones (i.e. Galaxy S6 series). Please check compatible devices list before buying the game.

Rain down a deluge of droid destruction while avoiding the hazards of an alien world in this fast paced arcade shoot em up.

Pitted against an army of murderous mechs you must battle your way through a myriad of locales from overrun space ports to bubbling lava filled volcanoes in order to escape the Warchasm. To aid you in your fight against the alien onslaught you will have an array of weapons at your disposal from ray guns and blasters to devastating mortars and high tech, quad missile launchers.

You will need a cool head, a keen eye and razor sharp reflexes as you fight off the alien horde and make your way through this perilous VR adventure.

So grab your guns, dive in to the action and experience your first Warchasm!

Welcome to the Knockout League, a single player arcade style boxing game built from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Its intuitive gameplay involves moving and dodging with your body and 1:1 punch movement that lets you attack how you want without relying on buttons for main gameplay. Train up with various boxing drills to take on a crazy cast of characters with different fighting styles and gameplay in order to become the champion of the Knockout League!

Oculus Cross-Buy enabled!
